text: Anata gataga fushinjin'na mono to (senjō de) mieru toki wa,(kare-ra no) kubi o uchikire. Kare-ra no ōku o korosu made (tatakai),(horyo ni wa) nawa o shikkari kake nasai. Sonogo wa tatakai ga owaru made nasake o hodokoshite hanasu ka, matawa minoshirokin o torunari seyo. Moshi arrā ga o nozominara, kitto (o jibun de) kare-ra ni hōfuku sa reyou. Daga kare wa, anata gata o tagaini kokoromiru tame ni (tatakai o meiji rareru). Oyoso arrā no michi no tame ni senshi shita mono ni wa, kesshite sono okonai o munashī mono ni nasa renai
